parallel.distributed

Class DObjectsCacheSrv

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DObjectsCacheSrv

  • public final class DObjectsCacheSrv
extends java.lang.Object
    Server class that allows storage and retrieval of sets of objects into an in-memory cache. Network clients send requests for adding objects into the global cache, retrieving the entire cache, or clearing the cache. Useful for storing QuantRule objects in the distributed versions of the QARMA algorithm.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2017

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        invoke as: java -cp <classpath> parallel.distibuted.DObjectsCacheSrv <port> . The program will start listening for incoming socket connections at the specified port; the client can then send any of the following requests:
        • Add (implemented in the DObjCacheAddReq class),
        • GetAll (implemented in the DObjCacheGetAllReq class) and
        • Clear (implemented in the DObjCacheClearReq class)
        .
        Parameters:
        args - String[] with args[0] int specifying the port to listen to.
